RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Ph.D. in Horticulture at Universit degli Studi della Tuscia di Viterbo, Italy (2014). MSc in Scienze e Tecnologie Agrarie at Universit degli Studi di Torino, Italy (2007). He is currently research collaborator at Consiglio per la Ricerca e l'Analisi dell'Economia Agraria, Ornamental Plants Research Unit (CRA-FSO), Sanremo, Italy. Has experience in in vivo and in vitro gamic and agamic propagation of floricultural, aromatic and nursery plants, germination protocols of wild species and molecular diagnosis of the most important viral deseases of buttercup, carnation, daisy and aromatic plants.
